ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Urban Legends
ComicInfo.Summary:
The search for Deathwatch continues! The infamous killer’s trail leads Leo, Mikey, and a robotic Donatello to Sheldon, Arkansas, where they find themselves face-to-face with more murderous mayhem. Meanwhile, Raph, back home in New York, makes a chilling discover during his duel with the mob. Could it be… Shredder’s inner sanctum?!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Frank Fosco (a) & Courtland Brugger (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Frank Fosco (a), Erik Larsen (a), Reuben Rude (c) & I.H.O.C. (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 3 |
